name: Easy Pete

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: That ought to keep things settled for awhile. Hope it stays that way.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
topics.response_text: What in tarnation?

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: For pete's sake...

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: That'll show 'em!

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: Here it comes!

topics.topic_text: Why are you called Easy Pete?
topics.response_text: Was a prospector until I decided to settle here to get away from the NCR. Now I just take it easy and help out with the Brahmin and Bighorners.

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about the people who attacked me?
topics.response_text: The one in the fancy suit seemed to be calling the shots, that's as much as I know. Other folks in town might know more.{TEXT IS CORRECT, NOT SOUND FILE.}

topics.topic_text: What do you use the Bighorners for?
topics.response_text: Meat and hide, mostly. Can't put a pack on 'em - they just lay down until you take it off.

topics.topic_text: Did you ever find anything good while prospecting?
topics.response_text: Nope. Had a pretty good claim once, way out east by the river, but got run off by Raiders. Eventually, got too old to keep going out.

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about Victor?
topics.response_text: The machine? Harmless, no matter what Trudy says. She thinks it's hiding something, but I think it's just a broken down relic with no place to be.

topics.topic_text: Never mind.
topics.response_text: Yup.

topics.topic_text: You were a prospector - like digging for gold and silver?
topics.response_text: Nah, nah - means I poked through old buildings looking for working tech and such. Some folks just call it "salvaging," but never liked the term.

topics.topic_text: What's wrong with the NCR?
topics.response_text: Don't get me wrong - the NCR's got a lot of decent folk in it. It's just that they make you part of them whether you like it or not.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Legion.
topics.response_text: They're slavers, led by a guy named{SEE-zer}Caesar. Or{less certainly, KAI-zar}Caesar. Not sure how you're supposed to say it.

topics.topic_text: What's so important about Hoover Dam?
topics.response_text: The Dam powers a lot of New Vegas. And then there's all that clean water lying in Lake Mead, too. Anybody who owns the Dam owns the territory.

topics.topic_text: I hear you've got dynamite. It would help us beat the powder gangers.
topics.response_text: Too dangerous. Gonna kill all yourselves if I let you touch it. Better to leave it buried - safer that way.

topics.topic_text: I'm familiar with the care and handling of explosives, dynamite included.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Uh huh. Guess you know what you're doing. I'll go dig it up and get it ready. You'll have it by the time the fighting starts.

topics.topic_text: How hard can it be? Just light them and throw.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Too dangerous, sorry. Blow yourself up, blow your neighbor up, blow the whole town up.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Joe Cobb?
topics.response_text: Bad trouble.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Keep your gun handy if you go poking around some of the abandoned places around here, like the schoolhouse.

topics.topic_text: That's... helpful.
topics.response_text: Welcome.

topics.topic_text: Never mind.
topics.response_text: Uh huh.

conversation.response_text: Keep your gun handy if you go poking around some of the abandoned places around here, like the schoolhouse. Critters move in there sometimes.

description:
Easy Pete is a 68 year-old African American Male.

A former prospector living in Goodsprings who now takes it easy while offering occasional advice.

Easy Pete's Personality: Easygoing and relaxed, but knowledgeable and willing to share wisdom when asked.

Easy Pete's Backstory: Easy Pete was once a prospector in the Mojave Wasteland, searching for valuable tech, chems, and weapons. During his time as a prospector, he became an expert in explosives, though it cost him his hearing in one ear. While he doesn't agree with the NCR's expansionist politics, he acknowledges their positive qualities and their role in keeping Caesar's Legion at bay. Now in his later years, he has settled in Goodsprings, where he occasionally works as a farmhand.
